EmailTemplate.name: Kim Provision 2 NADA 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Looking Forward To Your vAuto Provision Demo at NADA 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
I’m here in San Francisco, getting ready for NADA. We’re all set for the Provision demo we scheduled, and your free spin on our Prize Wheel.
Look for me at the vAuto booth (#1718S)—I’ll be wearing the “I’m Kim” button. I’ll connect you with a Product Specialist.
The vAuto team and I look forward to seeing you at Booth #1718S
If you have any questions or can’t make your appointment, call me directly at
815-341-1230. Thank you and have a great NADA!
Sincerely,
Associate Manager, Marketing
vAuto | Live Market View
cell: 815-341-1230
